base:
```markdown
To list more commands from a specific category, use +help <category>.

Features
--------
Change, Quote, Ping, Invite, Stats, RateWaifu, Git, Add Role, List Roles, Leave Role, Join Role, Avatar, Ship, Exhentai
Reddit, Suggestion, MyAnimeList

Reactions
--------
Cry, Confused, KillMe, Pout, Dance, Blush, Rawr, Rekt, Trump Wrong/Fake, Cat

Actions
--------
Marry, Divorce, Love, Poke, Slap, Kiss, Pat, Kill, Punch, Hugs, Wave, Spank, Kick, Bite, NoBulli, Dodge, Lick

Users
--------
Utah, Alex, Jova, Dreamy, Alcha, Rose

Administration
--------
Ban, Kick, Mute, Unmute

NSFW Commands
--------
Newd, Butt, Boobs, Tattoo, Gay, Yaoi, Dicks, Hentai

```markdown
Use +help <command> to get further information. (e.g. +help stats)

Features
--------
- Change
 - Notification (Bot Admins Only) - Change the default channel to receive notifications for Tron.
 - Giveaway Timeout (Moderators Only) - Change the default giveaway timeout for your server.
 - Server Prefix (Moderators Only) - Change the prefix for Tron commands on your server.

- Stats - List most popular commands and their usage count.
 - Command Name - List the amount of times this command has been used.

- Quote - Returns a random quote.

- Ping - Determine if the bot is on, and if so, what the current latency is.

- Invite - Returns the link to invite Tron to your server.

- RateWaifu - Rates your waifu on a scale of 1 - 10.

- Git - Returns GitHub link to where Tron's code is available.

- Add Role (Moderators Only) - Add a role to the available list of roles for your server.

- List Role - List roles that are currently available to join.

- Leave Role - Leave a role that you currently have.

- Join Role - Join a role that is available to you.

- Avatar - Shows a higher resolution (if available) version of a user's avatar.

- Ship - Takes the two mentioned users and mashes their names into a lovely mess.

- Exhentai - Provides the cookies necessary to access exhentai.

```markdown
Change Notification (Bot Admins Only)
--------
+change notification

Changes the channel that Tron sends notifications to when starting up or shutting down. Available to bot admins only.

Change Giveaway Timeout (Server Mods Only)
--------
+change gtimeout <seconds>

Changes the default timeout for giveaways in your server. Available to server mods only.

Change Server Prefix (Server Mods Only)
--------
+change prefix <prefix>

Changes the default prefix for Tron on your server, enabling you to avoid multiple bots using the same prefix.

base:
```markdown
Use +help <command> to get further information. (e.g. +help marry)

Actions
--------
- Marry - Propose to a user and ask for their hand in marriage.
  - Accept - Accept a marriage proposal.
  - Deny - Deny a marriage proposal.
  - List - List all marriages that you or the specified user are in.

- Divorce - Propose a divorce to a user that you're currently married to.
  - Accept - Accept a divorce proposal.
  - Deny - Deny a divorce proposal.
  - List - List all divorces that you or the specified user are in.

- Love - Displays a random love gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Newd - Sends a random nude image to a user if they have the option enabled.

- Poke - Displays a random poke gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Slap - Displays a random slap gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Kiss - Displays a random kiss gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Pat - Displays a random pat gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Kill - Displays a random kill gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Punch - Displays a random punch gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Wave - Displays a random wave gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Spank - Displays a random spank gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Hugs - Displays a random hug gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Kick - Displays a random kick gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

- Bite - Displays a random bite gif and if a user is specified, displays a message for them.

```markdown
Marry
--------
+marry

Propose to a user and ask for their hand in marriage.
